plot: When fellow operatives (and childhood friends) Matthew Johnson and Melvin Johnson disappear during an undercover mission in Hong Kong, Cleopatra Jones (Tamara Dobson) travels there to find them. With the help of local detective Mi Ling, Cleopatra discovers that her friends' disappearance has to do with The Dragon Lady, a much-feared blonde &"lipstick lesbian&" who runs a Macao casino and controls a major chunk of the local drug trade.   Written by  Ørnås
title: Cleopatra Jones y el casino de oro

original_name: Cleopatra Jones and the Casino of Gold
